description: Whether working in the garden or just for fun, the KÜHL KULTIVATR™ Women's Overall has your back. Our durable yet luxuriously soft stretch fabric delivers premium comfort for your everyday wear. Featuring an adjustable, relaxed fit and functional pockets for small tools and essentials, the KULTIVATR™ is ready for whatever comes next. Maximum (UPF 50+) sun protection.
name: Kultivatr Overall, Reg - Womens

specs.value: 38% Cotton, 28% Modal, 18% Lyocell, 14.5% Elasterell-P, 1.5% Lycra - 7 oz
